name: Genomics
description: Comprehensive study of the genetic material of organisms, including genome sequencing and analysis.

name: Transcriptomics
description: Analysis of all RNA transcripts produced by an organism under specific conditions.

name: Proteomics
description: Large-scale study of proteins, including their structure, function, and modifications.

name: Metagenomics
description: Analysis of genetic material recovered directly from environmental samples.

name: Structural Biology
description: Study of the molecular structure of biological macromolecules such as proteins and nucleic acids.

name: Epigenomics
description: Analysis of epigenetic modifications that affect gene expression without altering the DNA sequence.

name: Biological Networks
description: Modeling and analysis of complex interactions between biomolecules and cellular processes.

name: Clinical Bioinformatics
description: Application of bioinformatics methods for medical diagnosis and personalized medicine.

name: Machine Learning in Bioinformatics
description: Use of machine learning algorithms for the analysis of complex biological data.

name: Big Data & Repositories
description: Management and analysis of large volumes of biological data in public repositories.
